articles.content: After two straight days with no new deaths caused by COVID-19 reported to Colorado’s health department, the state’s tally inched up by four Monday, while the number of fatalities among people who had… [+2286 chars]

articles.author: AFP in Geneva
articles.title: WHO warns overuse of antibiotics for Covid-19 will cause more deaths - The Guardian
articles.description: Director general says “worrying number” of bacteria are becoming resistant to medicines

articles.author: Megan Vanselow
articles.title: 24 COVID-19 cases confirmed at local nursing home; virus claims 1 life - KWTX
articles.description: Twenty seven COVID-19 cases have been confirmed at a local nursing home one of whose residents has died of the virus, raising the total number of confirmed cases in Central Texas to close to 1,000 and the regional death toll to 16.
articles.content: (KWTX) Twenty seven COVID-19 cases have been confirmed at a Temple nursing home one of whose residents, a woman in her 90s, has become the fourth person to die of the virus in Bell County, raising th… [+5380 chars]
